name: Brain Ball Jump
description:
as of now Game is still in development and we're aiming to publish monthly updates to it!
we're high school students so please beare with us if the updates are delayed.
ok enough of us now let's talk about the game!

-Infinite mode (Gonna make it more diverse in terms of platform spawning)
-Campaigns (COMING SOON) levels made manually by us!
-Change games background, Balls and themes too! (COMING SOON)
